import math
t = input()
d = [1, 11, 111, 1111, 11111, 111111, 1111111, 11111111, 111111111]
for i in range(t):
	arr = []
	temp = []
	a = map(int, raw_input().split())
	for j in range(10):
		arr.append(a[j])
		if j!=0:
			temp.append(a[j])
	pos = arr.index(min(arr))
	pos1 = temp.index(min(temp))
	
	if pos == 0:
		if(arr[pos]!=temp[pos1]):
			print int(math.pow(10,(min(arr)+1)))
		else:
			print (d[min(arr)]*(pos1+1))
	else:
		print (d[min(arr)]*pos)
